description: in sepia ink bust-length portrait of woman turned to the right in a two-tiered necklace and buttons running down the front of her garment; hair is drawn in long finger-like strokes
inscription: LLC in plate in reverse: Walter 27 | LL of sheet, in pencil: \"Russisches Mädchen mit Halskette\" | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E.240-C | LRC of sheet, in pencil: No 45 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: L-38 / 2263
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 27
title: Russian Girl with Necklace (Sonia Gramatté)
